text: The Alfa Romeo 159 is a car produced by Alfa Romeo. It succeeded the 156 in 2005. Production ceased in 2011. It was eventually replaced in 2016 with the Giulia. == Engines == === Petrol === * 1750 TBi 147 kW (200 hp) * 1.8 MPI 103 kW (140 hp) * 1.9 JTS 118 kW (160 hp) * 2.2 JTS 136 kW (185 hp) * 3.2 JTS 191 kW (260 hp) === Diesel === * 1.9 JTDM 8V 88 kW (120 hp) * 1.9 JTDM 16V 110 kW (150 hp) * 2.0 JTDM 16V 100 kW (136 hp) and 125 kW (170 hp) * 2.4 JTDM 20V 147 kW (200 hp) and 154 kW (210 hp) == Other websites == 159 Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Alfa Romeo 159
